ygData.subject: Re: ALL spells currently in game....
ygData.msgSnippet: This thing is pretty useless, and I question whether it s original considering I got the same type of thing at http://www.foolio.net/ss/screenshot.html about 2
ygData.messageBody:
This thing is pretty useless, and I question whether it's original
considering I got the same type of thing at
http://www.foolio.net/ss/screenshot.html about 2 months ago. You could
probably find out which type of spell you should specielize in, but thats
about it. Then again it might not be a hard thing to program so practically
anyone could do it.
You can find out most information on spells at just about all popular EQ
sites,
http://gameznet.com/eq/ being the most informitive I've come across. They're
all pretty much the same though (magic listings).
